name: iicmp

stmt.origin: mp2an(wcel(cii, ccmp), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(nat1, cr))

body.origin:
|- wcel(cii, ccmp)
-| wcel(nat0, cr)
-| wcel(nat1, cr)
-| wi(wa(wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(nat1, cr)), wcel(cii, ccmp))
body.pretty:
⊢ II ∈ Comp
⊣ 0 ∈ ℝ
⊣ 1 ∈ ℝ
⊣ ((0 ∈ ℝ ∧ 1 ∈ ℝ)→ II ∈ Comp)
